document_data.caption: Onyx runs afoul of a ''dig'' spell.
document_data.name: Dig
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dig''''', formerly known as '''''Proctiv's dig''''', was a [[spell]] that excavated a large pit.{{Cite comic/Lunatics}}
document_data.Casters:
The spell could be cast by [[wizard]]s. By [[1370 DR]], it was known to the [[specialty priest]]s of the [[Mulhorandi pantheon|Mulhorandi god]] [[Geb]].

In the time of [[Netheril]], it could be cast by [[arcanist]]s of the [[Inventive]] and [[Variation]] specializations.
document_data.History:
Attributed to [[Proctiv]], the spell was first introduced in Netheril in [[-2060 DR|1799 NY (−2060 DR)]] under the name ''Proctiv's dig''. It later became known simply as ''dig''.

''Dig'' was an uncommon spell in [[Faerûn]] in the 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.Notable Uses:
During the [[Time of Troubles]], [[Luna|a member]] of the [[Swords of the Lady|Lunatics]] cast ''dig'' under [[Onyx the Invincible]] to stop him charging her. He fell flat on his face.{{Cite comic/Lunatics}}

According to [[Elminster]], the [[drow]] used the ''dig'' spell to open up metal and other mineral veins for their mines. According to the same, when the drow did that, they were attacked by [[dwarf|dwarven]] raiders under the pretense of "liberating" treasure.
